attributes.action: eating disorders on the school curriculum from year 7 to year 11
attributes.additional_details: The subject of eating disorders is often ignored. We believe that if children from as young as 12 years old are educated about the symptoms and severity of eating disorders, where to turn when they have a problem and how to feel comfortable in their own skin we will see a decrease in the amount of teenagers developing eating disorders, leading to a healthier and happier future.
